name: ShmupGrazer
description:
ShmupGrazer is a prototype made for https://itch.io/jam/bullet-jam-2021.

I am testing the mechanics of bullet hell games. This is my first attempt at bullet grazing.

You move your craft around with wasd, arrow keys, or the controller's left stick. 

You increase your graze multiplier by having bullets close to your core (the red part of the craft). Being hit on your core will reset your multiplier. 

Every ten seconds all enemies will be destroyed, and you'll gain score based on your current graze counter.

This prototype was made using Godot Engine 3.2.3 (https://godotengine.org/) and uses free assets from www.kenney.nl.
